mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store (menu_category_id, store_name, store_address, min_price, tel, owner_id, delivery_fee) VALUES (#{menuCategoryId},#{storeName},#{storeAddress}, #{minPrice},#{tel},#{ownerId},#{deliveryFee})
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET store_name=#{storeName},store_address=#{storeAddress}, min_price=#{minPrice},tel=#{tel}, delivery_fee=#{deliveryFee}WHERE id=#{id}
